description: A plugin for KeePass2 to add Yubikey challenge-response capability.

installer.script: Copy-Item "$dir\KeeChallenge_$version\KeeChallenge.dll" "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins"; Copy-Item "$dir\KeeChallenge_$version\32bit" "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins" -Recurse; Copy-Item "$dir\KeeChallenge_$version\64bit" "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins" -Recurse

uninstaller.script: Remove-Item "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins\KeeChallenge.dll"; Remove-Item "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins\32bit" -Recurse; Remove-Item "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins\64bit" -Recurse
